source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_SEQ_00<tab>Gundobald wants to wish you well on your investigation.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_SEQ_00<tab>リトルアラミゴのグンドバルドは、冒険者に何か告げたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_SEQ_01<tab>There is no more that Gundobald and his people can tell you of the masked stranger. Without another lead to investigate, return to the Waking Sands in Vesper Bay and report all that has transpired to Minfilia.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_SEQ_01<tab>グンドバルドが知り得る「仮面の男」の情報は、もうこれ以上はないらしい。次に赴くべき捜索の目標について相談するため、砂の家の「ミンフィリア」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_SEQ_02<tab>Listening to your report, Minfilia cannot hide her disquiet over the incident at Little Ala Mhigo. Thanking you for your efforts, she promises to look further into the matter.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_SEQ_02<tab>ミンフィリアはリトルアラミゴで起きた一連の事件について憂慮しているらしい。しかし同時に冒険者の活躍に満足しているようだ。新たな冒険に向け、英気を養おう。
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_TODO_00<tab>砂の家のミンフィリアに報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_GUNDOBALD_000_000<tab>Would that we had more information to offer, but what Wilred told you is the extent of our knowledge of the masked stranger.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_GUNDOBALD_000_000お前の追ってる「仮面の男」については、
ウィルレッドが言っていたことがすべてだ。
我々が知り得ることは伝えた……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_GUNDOBALD_000_001<tab>Left unchecked, that man will bring about great pain and suffering. I pray that you'll find and put a swift end to the creature─for the sake of the young ones who died by his poisoned words.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_GUNDOBALD_000_001別れは惜しいが、調査を続けるのであれば、
ほかの地をあたるべきだろう。
お前の仲間と、相談してみるといい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_010<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I'm reliably informed the investigation took you to Quarrymill and Little Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_010おかえりなさい！
ハリベルトから聞いたけれど、
ずいぶん大がかりな旅をさせてしまったようね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_011<tab>So tell me, were you able to learn aught of Lahabrea?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_011無事に「仮面の男」の情報はつかめたのかしら。
あなたが解決したリトルアラミゴの問題、聞かせてくれる？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_012<tab>Planted the knowledge of summoning in impressionable young minds, you say? Precisely the kind of deception the Ascians would employ...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_012窮乏に喘ぐアラミゴの青年たちに、
神降ろしの知識をあたえるだなんて……。
まさに、争いの火種をまいていたわけね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_013<tab>While many of the ills that ail the land can be attributed to the Calamity, some are being brought about by a malign will.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_013各地で起きている問題は、
第七霊災の混乱が招いたものだと思っていたけれど……
裏で、何かが動いているのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_014<tab>We must needs delve deeper into this, while things remain quiet on the primal front.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_014この問題、もう少し深く調べてみましょう。
蛮神に関する報告も、入っていないことだしね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_TATARU_000_015<tab>All work and no play makes Minfilia a dull Scion.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_TATARU_000_015<tab>相変わらず、ミンフィリアさんは仕事の鬼でっす。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_018<tab>Ahem. Mayhap we ought to rest awhile before speaking further of the investigation.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA710_00783_MINFILIA_000_018……コホン。
少し休んでから、次の調査の話をしましょう。
